message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of excellence. Our product offers unparalleled benefits and value, tailored to enhance your specific needs and expectations. We believe it could significantly contribute to your success and well-being. Considering its exceptional quality and the unique features it brings to the table, we kindly invite you to consider an offer of $1500000 for this exclusive opportunity.

Dear Alice, thank you for your offer. While I'm impressed with the product's features and quality, I'm looking to save as much as possible. Considering the product's value, I'm willing to offer $1200000. I believe this is a fair price, taking into account the market value and my budget. I'm excited to hear your thoughts on this proposal.
